department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: RFP for Strategic Advice and Business Consulting Services for the Receiver General
description: The Department of Public Works and Government Services PSPC is seeking a contractor to provide strategic advice and business consulting services to support the modernization of its Receiver General function.
full_summary:
# Request for Proposal (RFP)
### Summary
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites proposals for the provision of strategic advice and business consulting services for the Receiver General. 

### Tender Details
| Key Information | Value |
| --- | --- |
| **Reference Number** | WS3919002881-Doc3932864349 |
| **Amendment Number** | 14 |
| **Solicitation Number** | WS3919002881 |
| **Publication Date** | August 7, 2023 |
| **Tender Closing Date and Time** | October 10, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT |
| **Expected Contract Start Date** | None |
| **Expected Contract End Date** | None |
| **Procurement Category** | SRV (Services) |
| **Procurement Method** | Competitive - Open Bidding |

### Notice Details
* The tender status is currently EXPIRED.
* The procurement is open to parties who are eligible under the Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and others.
* The region of opportunity is the National Capital Region (NCR).
* The region of delivery is also the National Capital Region (NCR).

### Evaluation Criteria
The selection of the successful bidder will be based on a combined rating of technical merit and price, with the highest combined rating being the winner.

### Tender Documents and Information
For more information on the tender, please refer to the attached notice on the [Ariba web site](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17095091?extsite=MTcwOTUwOTFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).

All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by the closing date and time. Late bids will be declared non-responsive.

Note: The original text was written by a contractor with limited English literacy and contained multiple errors and inconsistencies.
